# Finally, the interview process you wanted
# Superior Candidate Experience
Simplify your interviews with Hatchways. Skip the stressful, unrealistic tests and let candidates show their skills with real tasks like **submitting a pull request** or **reviewing code.**
[ Explore![arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6226918b6fde351e136e0d04/64da2c5269e57310de2b167f_arrow-right-solid%20\(1\).svg)](http://www.hatchways.io/<https:/app2.hatchways.io/company>)![person on computer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6226918b6fde351e136e0d04/64dba1d42418d6a0f7fbb38c_computer.svg)
![Send a git repo as the interview process](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6226918b6fde351e136e0d04/64da4ad246f840f94d14fed1_ezgif.com-optimize%20\(2\).gif)
# Fast-Track Assessment Design
**Easily craft assessments using****our templates or upload your own****.** Benefit from our tried-and-true templates, informed by data and industry expertise. **Offer code challenges in any language** and select from tasks like bug fixes, feature additions, code reviews, and written or video responses.
[Schedule Demo![arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6226918b6fde351e136e0d04/64da2c5269e57310de2b167f_arrow-right-solid%20\(1\).svg)](http://www.hatchways.io/<https:/calendly.com/hatchways-team/intro>)![person with a notebook and pen](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6226918b6fde351e136e0d04/64dba085f5c693c05b2edc5a_drawing-illustration.svg)
![Use our catalogue to find an assessment to customize](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6226918b6fde351e136e0d04/64db8c697e11925104c79b50_Copy%20of%20Webflow%20animations%20\(1200%20%C3%97%20706%20px\).gif)
# Streamline Your Grading Process
Grade submissions with ease using Hatchways' robust tools—from **automated tests** to**instant cloud deployments** of candidate's submissions. Alternatively, leverage our human reviewers to spend less time reviewing and more time closing the right candidates!
[Explore![arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6226918b6fde351e136e0d04/64da2c5269e57310de2b167f_arrow-right-solid%20\(1\).svg)](http://www.hatchways.io/<https:/app2.hatchways.io/company>)![person with timer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6226918b6fde351e136e0d04/64dba1f1fb45dfb2ea1479b6_timing.svg)

**Hatchways: Redefining the Engineering Interview Experience**

Founded in 2018 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S19, Hatchways is a Toronto-based company on a mission: to make engineering interviews feel more like real work. The traditional tech interview often fails to reflect the actual skills and challenges of software development. Hatchways aims to change that.

### What They Do

Hatchways began by developing customizable, GitHub-based technical assessments. These allow candidates to demonstrate their skills through tasks that mimic real-world work scenarios, such as **reviewing code**, **submitting pull requests**, and **designing systems**. This practical approach not only assesses technical ability but also enhances the overall hiring process by providing more accurate signals about a candidate’s capabilities.

The Hatchways platform emphasizes a streamlined and user-friendly interview process that caters to specific job roles, making the experience more equitable and effective for both candidates and employers.

### Features
